review: I do recommend this game but there is a bug that I am now recieving everytime I log in. Whenever I log in, it will freeze and I will have to always quit from it. Now it is unplayable until it is fixed. I done I validation test on it but still no good. Gajin if you can reply, please let me know when you fixed this problem. Thanks.
Dont forget that if you want to be a bit cooler (Golden name, suit maybe, etc) you should get this DLC as well.
Good but...Whenever I finish loading a server I want to join, it crashes on me. It kinda irritates me. Please fix.9.2/10Would play even more again if this was fixed.
Like Minecraft? Like DayZ? Put them together and you have Unturned. It has guns and other weapons. This is when zombie killing gets better and more serious within this game.

Team Fortress: A super awesome game that is very popular and what is also awesome is the new taunts they added. The taunts I have is 'The High Five' (not new) 'The Schadenfreude' (not new) 'The Conga' (Added to the game some time ago) and 'The Square Dance' (Added to the game some time ago as well) Anyway, GREAT WORK, VALVE! Good luck people and I will see you on the battlefield.
